alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 1:23AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cass County through 200 AM CDT... At 123 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wheatland, or 25 miles west of Fargo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Casselton around 130 AM CDT. Embden around 145 AM CDT. Chaffee around 155 AM CDT. Durbin around 200 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Casselton Airport. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 320 and 332. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
